text: Susana Martinez (born July 14, 1959) is an American politician who served as the thirty-first Governor of New Mexico. She was the first female governor of New Mexico and the first female Hispanic governor in the United States. Martinez was a Democrat before the mid 1990s, around which time she became a Republican. Martinez is from El Paso, Texas. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American Roman Catholics Category:Governors of New Mexico Category:Politicians from El Paso, Texas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Susana Martinez
